title: Azure Stream Against the Crimson Inferno
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, 16:9 aspect ratio, cinematic lighting, Donghua Chinese style, professional illustration. A heroic firefighter clad in futuristic, samurai-inspired protective armor (red and black), featuring a glowing blue visor. He stands powerfully amidst massive, chaotic clouds of grey smoke and fierce crimson and orange flames. He is gripping a large fire hose, releasing dynamic, luminous blue streams of water that swirl and arc dramatically in the foreground. In the background, a majestic traditional East Asian multi-tiered pagoda is intensely engulfed in fire. Epic composition, low angle shot, dynamic action, rich textures.
negativePrompt: lowres, worst quality, low quality, illustration, 3D, blurry, deformed, disfigured, bad anatomy, missing limbs, watermark, text, signature, cropped, jpeg artifacts, sketches, monochrome.
